item.description:
On March 26, the Artspace Underground brings cutting-edge performances and experimental time-based art to the gallery. Curated by Madison Moore. 

  A night of exploring the current exhibits, performance art, music, and cocktails. 

 

($5 cover.) 

 

 In the Gallery - Scrawl

 

 

 

 Join us at the next Artspace Underground March 26, for your chance to walk the runway April 22 - 23 in The Urban Catwalk: Fashion + Street Culture:

 From 8 pm - 11 pm, join us for the first Artspace Underground of 2011.  This Underground features experimental performances by Bernard Herman, Ramble Tamble, and Black Mansion, cocktails by 116 Crown, and a model call in Liz Linden's Mall of America exhibition.  The model call is very low-key—think of it as fashion Halloween. Come in your best, most inspiring outfit, and you may get selected to participate in a special Street Style Fashion Show at the next Underground on April 23! To ease your nerves, there won’t be a panel of judges. Simply show up, enjoy the party, and if we like what we see, we’ll stop you and ask to take a picture of you and get your info. That’s it! Those selected will be notified, and more details will be available as we approach April 23rd. 

 The Underground is curated (and DJ'd) by cultural critic Madison Moore.  Come fierce, get noticed.    

 The Urban Catwalk: Fashion + Street Culture, a two-day symposium at Yale University organized by Madison Moore and Alex Tudela, aims to investigate the relationships between style, streets and pop culture. It addresses the question: why do so many people care about the way other people dress?

The Urban Catwalk is generously sponsored by the following Yale University departments and programs: the American Studies Program, the Yale Graduate School, the World Performance Project, the Office for Diversity and Equal Opportunity, the Yale Research Initiative on the History of Sexualities, the Department of African American Studies, and the Department of French.

 

http://www.theurbancatwalk.net/
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the entryway at 7:45 will wear bw Scarf with piano keys
item.why: a cross cultural evening with art, performance, music and cocktails.
item.name: Artspace Underground
